subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
UEFA European Football Championship
lead_paragraph: There would be lots of hurdles if the 2020 tournament were to be expanded to six host countries, but previous events have shown that soccer is capable of overcoming such challenges.
snippet: There would be lots of hurdles if the 2020 tournament were to be expanded to six host countries, but previous events have shown that soccer is capable of overcoming such challenges.
